entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 11:30 AM NDT Monday 16 May 2016
Temperature: 5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Wind: SW 18 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 7 except 11 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle late this afternoon. Fog patches. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. High 7 except 11 inland. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle this evening. Showers beginning near midnight except flurries inland and over higher terrain. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming light overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 7.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Flurries inland and over higher terrain early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 mm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 16 May 2016
